column4: Need some help... I have a laptop hooked up to an external monitor. At night, I shut off the external, and close my laptop screen (the residual light annoys me)... apparently ubuntu thinks that it should change my monitor configuration to use one monitor when I do this. How do I get it to not change configurations automatically?
you should check out your monitors preferences
you mean when you close the lid of your laptop, it still stays on ?
you need to check your power management preferences then
you can make your computer either go on stand-by or hibernate when you close the lid...I am sure you should be able to figure out which suits you best
